meanings.definition: The number equivalent to the sum of nine and one.
meanings.sent1: I have ten fingers on my hands.
meanings.sent2: She counted to ten before jumping.
meanings.sent3: Ten little ducks went swimming one day.
meanings.sent4: The ten students in the class were eager to learn.
meanings.sent5: The cake was decorated with ten colorful candles.

meanings.definition: A group or set of ten individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: There were ten apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team consisted of ten players.
meanings.sent3: Ten puppies played in the park happily.
meanings.sent4: The ten books on the shelf looked organized.
meanings.sent5: She received a bouquet of ten beautiful roses.

meanings.sent1: He paid with a ten for his meal.
meanings.sent2: She found a ten in her pocket.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted tens.
meanings.sent4: The cashier handed back a ten as change.
meanings.sent5: She saved up her allowance until she had a ten.
